firstRune.name: fireball
firstRune.description: Launches a fireball, inflicts damage equal to {dmg}% of ATK on the enemy it first hits and nearby enemies, knocks them back, and reduces the hit enemies' Fire Resistance by 100% for 5 seconds.

secondRune.name: firespear
secondRune.description: Hurls a flaming spear that pierces enemies inflicts damage equal to {dmg}% of ATK, stuns the enemy for 3 seconds, and reduces their Damage Reduction by 100%
